SEARCH
Package org.hms.services.drugdispensary

Class DrugDispensaryService

java.lang.Object
org.hms.services.AbstractService<IDrugStockDataInterface>
org.hms.services.drugdispensary.DrugDispensaryService
public class DrugDispensaryService extends AbstractService<IDrugStockDataInterface>
DrugDispensaryService is responsible for managing drug inventory and processing drug dispense and replenish requests. It interacts with the underlying data interface to retrieve and manipulate drug stock information.

      a string representation of the drug replenish requests.

      Returns:
      a string representation of the drug inventory

    • getLowStockDrugs

      public DrugInventoryTable getLowStockDrugs()
      Looks through drugInventory, and returns a table of drugs with quantity invalid input: '<' lowStockAlertThreshold
      Returns:
      READ-ONLY copy of DrugInventoryTable filtered by threshold

    • dispenseDrug

      public boolean dispenseDrug(DrugDispenseRequest pendingRequest)
      Processes a drug dispense request and updates the inventory if valid.
      Parameters:
      pendingRequest - the drug dispense request to process.
      Returns:
      true if the drug was successfully dispensed, false otherwise

    • submitReplenishRequest

      public boolean submitReplenishRequest(String drugName, int addQuantity, String notes)
      Submits a replenish request for a specified drug by name
      Parameters:
      drugName - name of drug to replenish
      addQuantity - quantity to add
      notes - additional notes for the request
      Returns:
      true if request was successfully submitted, false otherwise

    • submitReplenishRequest

      public boolean submitReplenishRequest(int inventoryEntryID, int addQuantity, String notes)
      Submits a replenish request for a specific drug using its inventory entry ID.
      Parameters:
      inventoryEntryID - the ID of the inventory entry to replenish.
      addQuantity - the quantity to add.
      notes - additional notes for the request.
      Returns:
      true if the request was successfully submitted, false otherwise.

    • processReplenishRequest

      public boolean processReplenishRequest(int replenishRequestID, boolean accept)
      Processes a replenish and accepts or reject it
      Parameters:
      replenishRequestID - the ID of the replenish request
      accept - True if accepted, false if rejected
      Returns:
      True if request was successfully processed, false otherwise

    • approveAllReplenishRequests

      public boolean approveAllReplenishRequests()
      Processes all pending replenish requests and accepts them.
      Returns:
      true if all requests were successfully processed, false otherwise

    • setDrugStockQuantity

      public boolean setDrugStockQuantity(String drugName, int newQuantity)
      Updates the stock quantity for a specific drug by name
      Parameters:
      drugName - name of the drug
      newQuantity - the new stock quantity
      Returns:
      true if stock quantity successfully updated, false otherwise

    • setDrugLowStockAlertThreshold

      public boolean setDrugLowStockAlertThreshold(String drugName, int newLowStockAlertThreshold)
      Sets the low stock alert threshold for a specific drug by name.
      Parameters:
      drugName - the name of the drug.
      newLowStockAlertThreshold - the new low stock alert threshold to be set.
      Returns:
      true if the threshold was successfully updated, false otherwise.

      newQuantity - the quantity to add.
      Returns:
      true if the stock quantity was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • getDrugStockQuantity

      public int getDrugStockQuantity(String drugName)
      Retrieves the current stock quantity for a specific drug by name.
      Parameters:
      drugName - the name of the drug.
      Returns:
      the current stock quantity, or -1 if the drug does not exist.

      Returns:

    • doesDrugExist

      public boolean doesDrugExist(String drugName)
      Checks if a drug exists in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      drugName - the name of the drug to search for.
      Returns:
      true if the drug exists, false otherwise.

    • addNewDrug

      public boolean addNewDrug(String drugName, int quantity, int lowStockAlertThreshold)
      Adds a new drug to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      drugName - the name of the drug.
      quantity - the initial quantity of the drug.
      lowStockAlertThreshold - the low stock alert threshold for the drug.
      Returns:
      true if the drug was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • removeDrugFromInventory

      public boolean removeDrugFromInventory(int entryID)
      Removes a drug from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      entryID - the ID of the drug to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the drug was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • getDrugName

      public String getDrugName(int entryID)
      Retrieves the name of the drug specified by its entry ID.
      Parameters:
      entryID - the unique identifier of the drug in the inventory.
      Returns:
      the name of the drug if found, otherwise null.
